thread.title: Tactic #5 for Avoiding Budget Airline Fees: Wear All of Your Clothes

author: Rob Copeland
title: Tactic #5 for Avoiding Budget Airline Fees: Wear All of Your Clothes
text:
Low-cost airlines seem to expect that travelers have little more than a phone, a toothbrush and a change of underwear.
Then thereâ€™s Ashley Hubbard.
The Nashville, Tenn., office manager, 31 years old, made her approach to the airport checkpoint in Bangkok, a laptop in one hand, a camera in the other. She wore two T-shirts, a sweatshirt,... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
